text: he eemaan vaalo! allaah ke lie khade rahane vaale, nyaay ke saath saakshy dene vaale raho tatha kisee giroh kee shatruta tumhen isapar na ubhaar de ki nyaay na karo. vah (arthaatah sabake saath nyaay) allaah se darane ke adhik sameep[1] hai. nihsandeh tum jo kuchh karate ho, allaah usase bhalee-bhaanti soochit hai
